abstract: The Dow Jones industrial average surpassed 13,000 on Friday, while Treasuries fell and commodities gained on speculation that the European Central Bank would purchase bonds.
snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average surpassed 13,000 on Friday, while Treasuries fell and commodities gained on speculation that the European Central Bank would purchase bonds.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average surpassed 13,000 on Friday, while Treasuries fell and commodities gained on speculation that the European Central Bank would purchase bonds to help lower borrowing costs and ease the debt crisis.

headline.main: Market Up as European Central Bank Hints at Action
headline.print_headline: Market Up as European Central Bank Hints at Action
